description:
The Sengoku warlords seem to have settled in to the fast pace life of the modern age, much to Sasuke`s chagrin. Not all is quite as it seems though as even despite skyrocketing to idol fame, the warlords from a past have had ulterior motives all along. With another storm rolling in, will Sasuke make it to their final concert in time to say goodbye for real this time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikemen Sengoku: Toki o Kakeru ga Monogatari wa Owaranai
The Story Won`t End by Crossing Through Time
イケメン戦国◆時をかけるが物語は終わらない
